hero.title: Generate High-Impact Content in Seconds
hero.subtitle: Our AI empowers sales pros, marketers, and freelancers to craft compelling social posts, emails, and proposals without the writer's block. Stop writing, start growing.

problem.title: The Hidden Cost of Manual Proposal Writing
problem.subtitle: Every hour spent crafting proposals manually is an hour not spent growing your business

time_waste.description: Professionals spend 23% of their time on repetitive proposal writing tasks

missed_opportunities.title: Missed Opportunities
missed_opportunities.description: Slow response times result in 42% lower win rates for new business

solution.title: AI-Powered Proposal Generation That Actually Converts

step1.title: Choose Format

step2.title: Fill Details

step3.description: Get your AI-generated proposal and customize it to perfection

auth.loginDescription: Sign in to your account to continue
auth.name: Name
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.acceptTermsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions
auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
auth.resetLinkSent: Reset link sent! Check your email for instructions.
auth.resetError: Failed to send reset link. Please try again.
auth.emailConfirmationMessage: We've sent a confirmation link to {email}. Please check your inbox to activate your account.
auth.passwordUpdated: Password updated successfully! You can now sign in with your new password.

auth.invalidResetLink: Invalid or expired reset link. Please request a new one.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs

hobby.name: Hobby
hobby.description: Perfect for getting started with AI-powered proposals

pro.name: Premium
pro.description: For professionals who need unlimited proposal generation

questions.question: What counts as a proposal?
questions.answer: Each generated content piece (email, PDF, LinkedIn post, or Reddit post) counts as one proposal, regardless of length or complexity.

questions.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any charges.

questions.question: What happens if I exceed my proposal limit?
questions.answer: Free users will be prompted to upgrade. Premium users can purchase additional proposals or upgrade to a higher tier.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade security and never share your data with third parties. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest.

pricing.no_credit_card: No credit card required for free plan

profilesAndFiles.description: Manage the different identities the AI will use to generate content. Each profile has a unique tone and value proposition.
